title: Trends International Gallery Pops Harry Potter - Ravenclaw Crest Graphic Wall Art Wall Poster, 12" x 12", Black Framed Version
features: Easy to Hang - Our versatile frame design lets you stick and reposition Gallery Pops wall art tiles directly to most wall surfaces. Use the included adhesive mounts for direct mounting or hang traditionally with the built-in wall hanger

Mix & Match - Choose your artwork from a large selection of Officially Licensed designs to reflect your unique decorating style by personalizing your gallery wall art collection with all your favorite top-trending brands
Customize - Add an ultra-lightweight frame to customize your art, instantly updating your wall décor to complement any decorating style. Choose from black or white color options.
High-quality Artwork - Designed with crystal-clear artwork and printed with vibrant, full-color ink for excellent color and superior quality
Gallery Pops Dimensions - Framed Gallery Pops are 12'' x 12'' (30.48 x 30.48 cm) with no glass or acrylic covering, and Unframed Gallery Pops are 11.1875" x 11.1875" (28.4 x 28.4 cm)
description: This Gallery Pops Harry Potter - Ravenclaw Crest Graphic art print is perfect for any Harry Potter movie or book fan! Gallery Pops allow you to personalize your space and create your own wall décor collection across a wide selection of artwork. Represent your fandom for all to see and accent your space with complementary artwork from all your favorite brands. From the living room to the bedroom, the sports den to the office, Gallery Pops artwork is on-brand with a clean aesthetic and modern appeal, making it easy to hang in any room.
